title: This Morning, Lorraine and Loose Women cancelled - and presenters are not happy
text:

This Morning, Lorraine and Loose Women have all been cancelled today in another major shake-up.

The ITV daytime schedule has been ripped apart once again to make way for Rugby World Cup from Japan.

This Morning and Loose Women have frequently been scrapped for men running round chasing an egg-shaped ball over the past few weeks.

But it seems nothing is sacred anymore as Lorraine Kelly's popular show has also been kicked into touch on this dreary Wednesday morning.

As expected viewers are fuming - but they aren't the only ones as some of the presenters voiced their frustration.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: ITV)

Speaking at the end of Tuesday's Loose Women, host Ruth Langsford said: "Ruth: We won't be here tomorrow because the rugby is on...booooo..."

There were some small crumbs of comfort as Ruthie announced some very famous would be on later in the week.

She added: "But we'll be back on Thursday when Boyzone are on."

Scotland took on Russia at 8.15am this morning, while Wales faces Fiji at 10.45am in the second match of the day.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Fans of the ITV shows took to Twitter after discovering their favourite programmes had been taken off air today.

One viewer said: "Really fed up with @ITV today @gmb is only on for 2hrs. No @Lorraine and yet again no @thismorning"

"Am I the only viewer who is getting annoyed that the rugby is taking over and itv don’t care about their most popular programmes," added another.

A third said: "Lorraine and Loose Women are both cancelled today because ITV are broadcasting the Rugby World Cup instead and I can say with some confidence it's going to be the most strongly worded letter of complaint Ofcom will ever receive"

"Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh Lorraine has turned into a rugby player!!," joked a fourth.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

This Morning fans heard the devastating news at the end of Tuesday's show.

Holly Wiloughby said: "We're off tomorrow because of the rugby but we'll be back on Thursday where Sienna Miller tells us about her biggest film role yet.

Phil added: "Jamie Oliver is in the kitchen giving some of our favourite dishes a makeover"

While Holly said: "And it's time to face the music as we'll be meeting the stars of the Celebrity X Factor . See you Thursday."

(Image: S Meddle/ITV/REX)

One person who was actually happy about the rugby was Lorraine Kelly.

The Scottish presenter said: "We're not on tomorrow because of the ruby, Scotland are playing, yay, but join me on Thursday for MiKa and the X Factor judges."

This is certainly not the first time that the schedule has been shaken-up in the past few weeks.

(Image: ITV)

This Morning and Loose Women were both scrapped last Thursday for Ireland's match against Russia, which kicked off at 11.15am.

The week before both shows were cancelled on Monday - and replaced by rugby coverage the Thursday before that.

There were a total of four occasions in September that This Morning and Loose Women made way for the rugby.
description: The ITV daytime schedule has been ripped apart to make way for Rugby World Cup action in a major shake-up
